column3:
Thanks!

This is a bugfix, which should also go upstream?
Yes, probably.\nAlthough the EncodeDecimal change does break compatibility with older versions of bitcoind.\n
Sure, so I'd prefer those to be two commits :)\n

Actually this was already fixed: https://github.com/jgarzik/python-bitcoinrpc/commit/7ebeebb4f61917fe590d980cb4f9aefdce2c8f25

But somehow we forgot to fetch it.
Hm @luke-jr's commit seems to be more thorough. I indeed didn't test the https path. Will replace with his commit.\n
